about_the_game:
A lonely journey...

Awaken from your deep sleep and explore a world in darkness. Find enchanted amulets, incredible magics, face powerful enemies, overcome deadly traps, use the sword you possess to fight and make your way to your destiny.

A Little Metroidvania, Hack And Slash And More!

Mother's Sword is a 2D platformer with small Metroidvania elements. Face enemies in fast and precise hack and slash combat. Collect Energy Points to unlock new sword abilities.

Find Amulets and Magics with exceptional abilities, giving you unique skills to use in combat.

Learn new skills to explore and fight your enemies, use your knowledge to perform incredible combos.
